name: Jade Buddha Temple Tours
description:
You may ask what kind of city Shanghai is, it's important to make up your own mind – arrive with an open mind, and form your own answer as you wander across the city. Like a pearl on the banks of the Pacific Ocean, Shanghai has already become China's fastest growing city and tourist destination.
Shanghai is a multi-cultural metropolis with both modern and traditional Chinese features, showing her unique charm in every nook and cranny of the city. What's more, the old fashioned Western architecture in the Bund and modern skyscrapers in Pudong New District both complement and make each other more beautiful.
There are many places of historic interest and scenic beauty, as well as tourist scenic spots in Shanghai, like the Jade Buddha Temple, Yuyuan Garden, and Shanghai Old Street. The Jinmao Tower, Shanghai Museum and Shanghai Grand Theatre are all portrayed in the prospects for the international metropolis and reveal Shanghai's broad and magnaminous character.
